content: मेधाविन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मेधा-विनि] {@--1@} Very intelligent, having a good memory. {@--2@} Intelligent, wise, endowed with intellect; <ls>Pt. 1. 61.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A learned man, sage, scholar. {@--2@} A parrot. {@--3@} An intoxicating drink. --नी An epithet of the wife of Brahman.
